attributes.title: Back 4 Blood Rap - "Dead Don't Sleep On Me"
attributes.caption: We're back 4 more with another Back 4 Blood Rap to kickoff 2022!
attributes.description: We're back 4 more with another Back 4 Blood Rap to kickoff 2022!
attributes.display_title: Back 4 Blood Rap - "Dead Don't Sleep On Me"

attributes.title: Predator Rap - "Gun Show" (Live Action Version)
attributes.caption: This music video was a blast to make! This live-action format complements the love letter that "Gun Show" is to the Predator franchise better than we could have hoped! We hope you enjoyed this video rendition of the Predator Rap!
attributes.description: This music video was a blast to make! This live-action format complements the love letter that "Gun Show" is to the Predator franchise better than we could have hoped! We hope you enjoyed this video rendition of the Predator Rap!
attributes.display_title: Predator Rap - "Gun Show" (Live Action Version)

attributes.title: Dying Light 2 Rap - "Nightflyer"
attributes.caption: A beloved JT Music rap gets its much-anticipated follow-up for the Dying Light franchise! For real, people fervently LOVE the "Bite Me, so we hope this Dying Light 2 Rap can continue the legacy!
attributes.description: A beloved JT Music rap gets its much-anticipated follow-up for the Dying Light franchise! For real, people fervently LOVE the "Bite Me, so we hope this Dying Light 2 Rap can continue the legacy!
attributes.display_title: Dying Light 2 Rap - "Nightflyer"

attributes.title: Poppy Playtime Song - "What Makes Me Tick"
attributes.caption: More indie horror music goodness comes along with this Poppy Playtime Song! Enjoy!
attributes.description: More indie horror music goodness comes along with this Poppy Playtime Song! Enjoy!
attributes.display_title: Poppy Playtime Song - "What Makes Me Tick"

attributes.title: Elden Ring Rap - "Shed No Grace On Me"
attributes.caption: Enjoy our Elden Ring Rap!
attributes.description: Enjoy our Elden Ring Rap!
attributes.display_title: Elden Ring Rap - "Shed No Grace On Me"

attributes.title: The Batman Rap - "Riddle For You"
attributes.caption: We had something else planned for this weekend actually, but after seeing The Batman, creative juices took over and we made this song influenced heavily by the Riddler from the latest movie!
attributes.description: We had something else planned for this weekend actually, but after seeing The Batman, creative juices took over and we made this song influenced heavily by the Riddler from the latest movie!
attributes.display_title: The Batman Rap - "Riddle For You"

attributes.title: Sander Cohen Rap - "Masquerade"
attributes.caption: Making Bioshock songs never gets old for us and especially exploring one of the more interesting characters from the game made it an absolute treat. We hope you enjoy this Sander Cohen Rap!
attributes.description: Making Bioshock songs never gets old for us and especially exploring one of the more interesting characters from the game made it an absolute treat. We hope you enjoy this Sander Cohen Rap!
attributes.display_title: Sander Cohen Rap - "Masquerade"

attributes.title: The Cuphead Show! Rap - "Devil of a Time"
attributes.caption: Sure, revisiting Cuphead and this musical style is fun. BUT what's most fun is playing around with these accents from The Cuphead Show!
attributes.description: Sure, revisiting Cuphead and this musical style is fun. BUT what's most fun is playing around with these accents from The Cuphead Show!
attributes.display_title: The Cuphead Show! Rap - "Devil of a Time"

attributes.title: Apex Legends Rap - "Not Even Halfway Up"
attributes.caption: It's about time we revisit Apex Legends with another rap! This time we name-dropped all 20 heroes!
attributes.description: It's about time we revisit Apex Legends with another rap! This time we name-dropped all 20 heroes!
attributes.display_title: Apex Legends Rap - "Not Even Halfway Up"

attributes.title: Hades Rap - "Not Your Father's Son"
attributes.caption: A long overdue rap for the awesome game, Hades!!!
attributes.description: A long overdue rap for the awesome game, Hades!!!
attributes.display_title: Hades Rap - "Not Your Father's Son"

attributes.title: ELDEN RING RAP - "Solo" (Let Me Solo Her Song)
attributes.caption: Enjoy our Elden Ring Rap!
attributes.description: Enjoy our Elden Ring Rap!
attributes.display_title: ELDEN RING RAP - "Solo" (Let Me Solo Her Song)

attributes.title: Moon Knight Rap - "Become the Knight"
attributes.caption: We hope you enjoy our rap on Moon Knight!!
attributes.description: We hope you enjoy our rap on Moon Knight!!
attributes.display_title: Moon Knight Rap - "Become the Knight"

attributes.title: "Third Sword" - A Witcher Song
attributes.caption: Geralt has his steel sword for humans, silver for monsters and his third sword for...
attributes.description: Geralt has his steel sword for humans, silver for monsters and his third sword for...
attributes.display_title: "Third Sword" - A Witcher Song

attributes.title: Obi-Wan Kenobi Rap - "Old Ben"
attributes.caption: Obi-Wan Kenobi? Ummm, never heard of him. Nice to meet you, by the way, my name is Ben Kenobi.
attributes.description: Obi-Wan Kenobi? Ummm, never heard of him. Nice to meet you, by the way, my name is Ben Kenobi.
attributes.display_title: Obi-Wan Kenobi Rap - "Old Ben"

attributes.title: "Booty Bound" - Sea of Thieves Song
attributes.caption: Argggg! We've been cowboys, we've been space marines, and more much...BUT being pirates was at the top of our list. And thus, here you have a live-action version of "Booty Bound"!
attributes.description: Argggg! We've been cowboys, we've been space marines, and more much...BUT being pirates was at the top of our list. And thus, here you have a live-action version of "Booty Bound"!
attributes.display_title: "Booty Bound" - Sea of Thieves Song

attributes.title: Cuphead DLC Rap - "Best Served Cold"
attributes.caption: Don't mess with a Cuphead 'nuff said.
attributes.description: Don't mess with a Cuphead 'nuff said.
attributes.display_title: Cuphead DLC Rap - "Best Served Cold"

attributes.title: Saints Row Rap - "Back to the Row"
attributes.caption: The old Saints Row raps were some of the most fun to make songs! We definitely wanted to go down memory lane and make another Saints Row song when the opportunity came!
attributes.description: The old Saints Row raps were some of the most fun to make songs! We definitely wanted to go down memory lane and make another Saints Row song when the opportunity came!
attributes.display_title: Saints Row Rap - "Back to the Row"

attributes.title: Destroy All Humans 2: Reprobed Rap - "Prepare to be Probed"
attributes.caption: A song about aliens and colonoscopies. That sounds about right.
attributes.description: A song about aliens and colonoscopies. That sounds about right.
attributes.display_title: Destroy All Humans 2: Reprobed Rap - "Prepare to be Probed"

attributes.title: Cult of the Lamb Rap - "Song of the Lamb"
attributes.caption: Now taking members for the cult of JT? Who's in? I kid, I kid, but please do enjoy this Cult of the Lamb Rap!!
attributes.description: Now taking members for the cult of JT? Who's in? I kid, I kid, but please do enjoy this Cult of the Lamb Rap!!
attributes.display_title: Cult of the Lamb Rap - "Song of the Lamb"

attributes.title: Scorn Rap - "Sick of Myself"
attributes.caption: Skull's been patiently waiting for this game to come out for six years to make this Scorn Rap. And finally, here we are.
attributes.description: Skull's been patiently waiting for this game to come out for six years to make this Scorn Rap. And finally, here we are.
attributes.display_title: Scorn Rap - "Sick of Myself"

attributes.title: Call of Duty Modern Warfare 2 Rap - "Looking for a Fight"
attributes.caption: We had to bring it back. Hope you old fans enjoyed the trip down memory lane with this Modern Warfare 2 Rap!!
attributes.description: We had to bring it back. Hope you old fans enjoyed the trip down memory lane with this Modern Warfare 2 Rap!!
attributes.display_title: Call of Duty Modern Warfare 2 Rap - "Looking for a Fight"

attributes.title: Bendy and the Dark Revival Rap - "The Details in the Devil"
attributes.caption: BENDY'S BACK BABY!!! Enjoy our Bendy and the Dark Revival Rap!
attributes.description: BENDY'S BACK BABY!!! Enjoy our Bendy and the Dark Revival Rap!
attributes.display_title: Bendy and the Dark Revival Rap - "The Details in the Devil"

attributes.title: "Anybody Home?" - Hello Neighbor 2 Rap
attributes.caption: What is that neighbor up to?!?
attributes.description: What is that neighbor up to?!?
attributes.display_title: "Anybody Home?" - Hello Neighbor 2 Rap

attributes.title: Among Us Song - "Told You So" (Animated Version)
attributes.caption: Coda Animation surprised us with this AWESOME animation for "Told You So". We remastered the song and added some sound design to accompany the music video. We hope you dig this new presentation of our Among Us Song!
attributes.description: Coda Animation surprised us with this AWESOME animation for "Told You So". We remastered the song and added some sound design to accompany the music video. We hope you dig this new presentation of our Among Us Song!
attributes.display_title: Among Us Song - "Told You So" (Animated Version)

attributes.title: The Callisto Protocol Rap - "Evolving"
attributes.caption: Atmospheric space horror game? Oh yeah, you know we just had to make a track for The Callisto Protocol!
attributes.description: Atmospheric space horror game? Oh yeah, you know we just had to make a track for The Callisto Protocol!
attributes.display_title: The Callisto Protocol Rap - "Evolving"

attributes.title: God of War Ragnarok Rap - "One Footprint Behind"
attributes.caption: You know we wouldn't have let 2022 slip by without making a song for God of War Ragnarok!
attributes.description: You know we wouldn't have let 2022 slip by without making a song for God of War Ragnarok!
attributes.display_title: God of War Ragnarok Rap - "One Footprint Behind"
